list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move smoothly and quietly with gliding steps, in a stealthy or sensuous manner.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the fox came slinking through the woods
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Con cáo đến lướt qua rừng

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she moved with a sensuous slink
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy di chuyển với một cái lướt gió gợi cảm
